Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.lucene

Interface Summary
DocumentMapper Maps an entity into a lucene Document
IndexOperationListener Listener interface for listener operations
 

Class Summary
AbstractDocumentMapper<E extends Entity & Indexable> Abstract implementation for document mappers
DocsIterator<E extends Entity & Indexable> An iterator for returned documents in a full text search
DocumentBuilder Helper to build a lucene Document
Filters A filter collection
IdFieldSelector A FieldSelector which loads only the "id" field
IndexHandler Handles configuration and operation of Lucene indexes
IndexIterator<T extends Entity & Indexable> An iterator over a search index
IndexOperationRunner Keeps polling the IndexOperation entities and applying them
LuceneFormatter Formats basic types to Strings in order to be indexed
LuceneQueryHandler Handler for entity queries using Lucene
LuceneUtils Contains utilities for Lucene
